snippet.title: Quadroids - Reveal Trailer | PS4 Games
snippet.description:
We're looking for our next Employee of the Month! ��

The Mind Twisting Quadroids will split your brain this year on PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch. Quadroids is a mind-twisting pixel-art strategy puzzle platformer that disrupts the genre with a major twist. Players get to clear 100+ hazard-filled interconnected levels by coordinating their minions simultaneously across four screens.

Coming on PlayStation 4 (PlayStation 5 compatible) in 2023.

#ps4 #ps4games
